Uses of Package
dj2.core

  • Packages that use dj2.core 
    Package Description
    dj2.core  
    dj2.gui  
    dj2.persistence  
    dj2.tests  
  • Classes in dj2.core used by dj2.core 
    Class and Description
    Album
    This is the Album class, it has got all the information about an Album and is related to all its Music Tracks.
    Artist
    This is the artist class, it has got all the information about him/her plus all of the related singles, albums and concerts.
    Concert
    This is the Concert class, it has got all the information about a Concert and is related to all its Music Tracks.
    LinkedList
    This class is inherited by PlayList and MostRecentlyPlayedList and used by Group, MusicTrack and Album which is why it is a Generic class, multiple classes depend on it.
    LinkedListNode
    The LinkedList class uses this class to generate nodes.
    MostRecentlyPlayedList
    This class is a dynamically generated list, the end user doesn't add tracks to it.
    MusicTrack
    This is the MusicTrack Class, it has got all the information about a music track plus it adds automatically it self to mostRecentlyPlayedList if it is played.
    SimpleAudioPlayer
    plays an audio in JavaFX 2.x
  • Classes in dj2.core used by dj2.gui 
    Class and Description
    Album
    This is the Album class, it has got all the information about an Album and is related to all its Music Tracks.
    LinkedList
    This class is inherited by PlayList and MostRecentlyPlayedList and used by Group, MusicTrack and Album which is why it is a Generic class, multiple classes depend on it.
    MostRecentlyPlayedList
    This class is a dynamically generated list, the end user doesn't add tracks to it.
    MusicTrack
    This is the MusicTrack Class, it has got all the information about a music track plus it adds automatically it self to mostRecentlyPlayedList if it is played.
    MusicTrackCatalog
    This class is used to represent all of the tabs that are in the main panel, it contains three LinkedLists artistOrGroup, styles and albums.
    PlayList
    This class is a manually generated list, the end user is the one who adds tracks to it.
  • Classes in dj2.core used by dj2.persistence 
    Class and Description
    MostRecentlyPlayedList
    This class is a dynamically generated list, the end user doesn't add tracks to it.
    PlayList
    This class is a manually generated list, the end user is the one who adds tracks to it.
  • Classes in dj2.core used by dj2.tests 
    Class and Description
    MostRecentlyPlayedList
    This class is a dynamically generated list, the end user doesn't add tracks to it.
    MusicTrackCatalog
    This class is used to represent all of the tabs that are in the main panel, it contains three LinkedLists artistOrGroup, styles and albums.
    SimpleAudioPlayer
    plays an audio in JavaFX 2.x
